text: Gergana may refer to: * Gergana (Bulgarian singer), Bulgarian pop-folk singer * Gergena Branzova, former professional basketball player * Gergana Kochanova, first runner-up in the Miss Bulgaria 2007 contest * Gergana Velinova, co- founder of the Bulgarian Children's Chorus and School Gergana * Gerri Peev, British-Bulgarian journalist * 4102 Gergana, a main-belt asteroid * Gergana, an opera by Georgi Atanasov * Gergana (poem), a poem by Petko Slaveykov
title: Gergana
